mapper.select: select ttc.title cTitle, ttc.start_date startDate, ttc.end_date endDate, ttc.reg_date regDate, ttc.state, ttc.is_public isPublic, ttp.title pTitle, tp.title prjTitle from tb_task_child ttc inner join tb_task_parent ttp on ttc.parent_task_id = ttp.task_id inner join tb_project tp on ttp.project_id = tp.project_id where (current_date between ttc.start_date::date and ttc.end_date::date) and ttc.member_no=1;
